comment: A person who likes cricket and kabbadi a lot! Tall ,strong and one of the big dons of our room 201 XD . His aggression sometimes leads to funny moments 😂. A nice person.  All the best for future bro !
name: Raghuvamsi Bokka

comment: A person who always learn by observing and really good volleyball player. See bro ek din me bhi volleyball smash shikh lunga and jab bhi saath khelenge un sari smashes jo tune face pe maari he unka badla lunga me sambhal ke rehna😤. Always keep smiling bro. All the best for future.
name: Viral S Rathod

comment: One of the finest volleyball spikers of IIT Indore. Bus thodi jump aachi hoti toh😁. You are a genuinely nice person, All the best for UPSC dream bhai.
name: Sidharth

comment: Thank u for tolerating my demon laugh 😈.. Bass shadi me bula lena
name: Jitendra Kumar

comment: Raka the legend, vollyball gawd , tere smash bas mein hi sambhal sakta hu, wo sath mai gym Jana hamesha yad rahega. All the best Choudhary Sahab !!
name: BHUPESH KUMAR

comment: Raka King! Jiski aadhi baat samajh na aaye, aur agar kuch bolo toh gussa tum par hi dikhaye. Sach mein, express train se bhi tezz hai bhai ka temper!
name: Puneet Gupta
